summary: Mathematician with management experience, responsible for data analysis and reporting to support decision-making. Problem-solving and critical thinking capabilities. Specializes in Corporate Security, fraud analytics, and fraud detection, with experience in developing KPIs and dashboards for decision-making.
name: Oscar Quiroga

professional_experience.description: Team Leader specializing in Corporate Security, responsible for delivering reports, dashboards, and in-depth analyses. Adept at developing and implementing KPIs related to fraud and cybersecurity for senior executives.

Led the initiative to educate cross-functional teams on advanced analysis techniques for intelligence gathering. Played a pivotal role in building and implementing KPIs to assess the impact and effectiveness of products developed.

certifications: SQL - MySQL for data analysis and Business Intelligence - Udemy
Fraud Detection in Python - Data Camp
